page.title: 14WEST PENWITH GUN CLUB CONT'D
page.content: There are 4 disiplines:universal trench,down the line,skeet and sporting. In universal trench,5 traps fire clay pigeons randomly by computer which travel away between 60mph to 100mph.Orange clay pigeons are used for the fast and black for the slow ones.Some are painted white for flood light shooting.Five stations, 1 metre square,are used for shooting from.The pigeons are triggered by microphone. Down the line has five stations with only one trap firing randomly away from the stations at 68mph. Skeet disipline has seven stations with two traps,one high and one low firing across,with an option for delaying firing. Sporting discipline has two traps used for the practice of shooting game accurately.
